?begin_date: yyyy-mm(-dd), specifying day does not have an impact in general, as GRACE TVG products are usually given with time resolution of a month.
?end_date: yyyy-mm(-dd), specifying day does not have an impact in general, as GRACE TVG products are usually given with time resolution of a month.
?basin: name of basin that is preset, or a relative filepath of a basin kernel given in format of SHC, or shpfile
?leakage_method: Multiplicative, Scaling, Addictive, BufferZone. ForwardModeling, DataDriven, Iterative
